standard.label: Standard tone
standard.instructions: Write in a clear and professional manner. Use simple language and maintain a balanced tone.

success.label: Success message
success.instructions: Communicate success in a positive and professional way. Provide clear next steps when needed.

error.label: Error message
error.instructions: Explain the issue clearly and provide a solution. Keep the tone helpful and constructive.

cta.label: Call to action
cta.instructions: Use clear and actionable language. Keep text concise and informative.

warning.label: Warning message
warning.instructions: Clearly communicate important information or warnings. Provide guidance in a professional manner.
